& þt he si ge-lufod of eallen heorten. & of eallen andgytte. & of ealre sawle. & of ealre strencðe. & lufian his nextan swa hine sylfne. þt is mare eallen on-sægdnyssen & offrungen.
Þa se hælend ge-seah þt he hym wislice andswerede he saigde hym ne ert þu feor fram godes rice. & hine ne dorste nan man axian.
þa cwæð se hælend on þam temple lærende. hu seggeð þa boceres þt crist sy dauiðes sune.
Dauid self cwæð to þam halgen gaste. Drihten cwæð to minen drihtene site on minen swidren healfe. odðe ic þine feond asette to fot-scamele þinre fote.
Dauid self nemde hine drihten. & hwanen is he his sunu. & micel menige hine lufelice ge-herde.
Ða sæde he heom on his lare. Warnieð fram boceren. þa willeð on ge-gyrtlen gan & beon on stræte ge-grette.
& on fermesten lareow-setlen sitten on ge-samnungen. & þa fyrmesten setlen on beorscipen.
þa þe wudewena hus for-swelged mid heora langsumen ge-bedan. Þa on-foð længestne dom.
Ða sæt se hælend on-gean þane tol-scamel. & ge-seah hu þt folc hire feoh torfede on þane tol-scamel. & manige weliga torfeden fela.
ða com an earm wudewe and warp twege feorþinges.
Ða cleopede he his leorning-cnihtes & saide heom. Soðlice ic eow segge þæt þeos earme wudewe ealre mest brohte þare þe on þanne toll-scamel brohte.
Ealle senden of þan þe hyo ge-noh hæfden. Soðlice þeos of hire ermðe eall þæt hyo hæfde sealde ealle hire and-lyfene.
Þa he of þam temple eode. þa . an of his leorning-cnihten to him. Lareow loca hwilce stanes her synt. & hwilce ge-tymbrenge. þisses temples.
þa cwæð se hælend. ne ge-seo ge ealle þas mycelen ge-tymbrenge. ne beoð her læfd stan ofer stan þe ne wurð to-worpen.
Ða hyo sæten on oliuetes dune. on-gean þæt tempel. synderlice hine petrus. & Iacobus. & Iohannes. & Andreas acsoden.
Sege us hwænne þas þing ge-wurðen. & hwilc taken beoð þanne ealle þas þing ge-wurðe sculen. & hwilc tacen byð þanne ealle þas þing on-ginneð. & beon sculen ge-ended.
þa on-gan se hælend heom andsweriende to cweðen. warnieð þt eow nan man ne be-swice.
Soðlice manege cumeð on minen namen. & cweðað. ic eom crist. & be-swiced manege.
& þanne ge ge-hereð ge-fehte & ge-fyhte hlisan. ne on-dræde ge eow. hit byred þæt hit ge-limpe. ac þanne gyt nys ænde.
Soðlice þeod arist on-gean þeode. & rice on-gen rice. & byoð eorðen steriunge geond stowe & hunger. þis synde sare angin.
Warnieð eow sylfe. hyo sylleð eow on ge-þeohte & swinged on ge-samnungen. & ge standeð be-foren demen & kyningen for minen naman heom on ge-witnysse & on ealle þeode.
Ærest ge-byreð beon þæt godspell ge-boded.
& þanne hyo syllende eow lædeð ne for-smeage ge hwæt ge spræcen. ac spreceð þæt eow on þare tide ge-seald byð. Ne sende ge na sprecende ac se halge gast.
Soðlice se broðer þanne broðer to deaðe sylð. & se fæder his sune. & þa bearn ariseð agen heore maiges. & mid deaðe hyo ge-weccæð.
& ge beoð eallen on hatigunge for minen namen. Soðlice se beoð hal se þe oð ende þurh-wunieð.
Þanne ge ge-seoð þare to-wardnysse asceonunge standen þær hyo ne scel þanne on-gyte se þe ræt. fleon þanne on muntes þa þe synde on iudëë.
& se þe is ofer þecene ne stige he on his hus. ne he in ne ga þt he aht on his huse nyme.
& se ðe byð on acere ne cherre he on-gean þt he his reaf nime.
Wa kennenden on þam dagen
byddeð þt þis on wintre ne ge-wurðe.
Soðlice on þam dagen beoð swilce ge-drefednysse. swilce ge ne (sic) wurðon. of fremðe. þare ge sceafte þe god ge-scop. odðe nu. ne nane ne ge-wurdeð.
Ænd gyf drihten þas dages ne ge-scyrte. nan flæsc ne wurðe hal ac for þam ge-corenen þe he ge-cheas he scyrte þa dages.
Ænd gyf eow hwilc saigð witodlice her is crist. witodlice þær he is. ne ge-lyfe ge.
Soðlice lease cristes & lease witegen ariseð & wirceð for-beacne to be-swicene. Eac gyf hit beon maig þa ge-corene.
Warnied eow. nu ealle þing þe ic eow fore-sæde.
ac on þam dagen æfter þare ge-swæncednysse beoð sunne aþeostred. & se mone his brihtnysse ne sylð.
& heofenes steorren beoð fallende. & beoð astyrede þa manege þe on heofena synde.
Ðanne ge-syeð hyo mannes suna cumende on ge-nipum mid mycelen maigne & wuldre.
þanne sent he his ængles. & hyo gaderieð his ge-corene of feower winden of eorden heahnysse oð heofenes heahnysse.
Leorniað an byspell be þam fic-treowe. þanne his twi beoð mare. & leaf beoð akenned. ge witen þæt sumer is ge-hende.
& wite ge þanne ge þas þing ge-seoð þæt he ys dure ge-hende.
Soðlice ic eow segge þt þeos cneores ne ge-wit ær þan ealle þas þing ge-wurðen.
heofene & eorðe ge-witoð. witodlice mine word ne ge-witeð.
Be þam daige & þare tide nan man nat. ne engles on heofene ne mannes sunu buton fæder ane.
Warnied & wacieð & ge-byddað eow ge nyten hwænne sye tid is.
Swa se man þe ælþeodilice ferde. for-let his hus. & sealde his þeowen þane an-weald ge-hwilces weorces. & beode þam dureworde þt he wacie.
Eornestlice wacieð. ge nyten hwænne þas huses hlaford cymd. þe on æfen þe on midre nihte. þe on hancrede. þe on morgen.
þe læs þe he eow slæpende ge-finde þanne he færenge cymð.
Soðlice þt ic eow segge. eallen ic hit segge wakieð.
Soðlice þa æfter twam dagen wæren eastren. & þa sohten þa heah-sacerdes & þa boceres hu hyo hine mid facne namen & of-slogen.
Þa cwæðen hy næs na on freols-daige þy læs þas folces ge-hlyd wurðe.
and þa se hælend wæs on bethania on symones huse anes hreofelen & þær sæt. Þa com an wif & hæfde hire sealfe-box deorewurðe nardes. & to-brokene sealf-boxe ofer his heafed aget.
Sume hit unwurdlice for-bæren. & be-tweoxe heom sylfen cwæðen. for hwi wæs þises sealfe for-spillednyss ge-worðen.
þeos sealfe mihte beon ge-seald to þrem hund panegen. & beon þearfen ge-seald & yrseden agen hy.
Þa . se hælend. Læted hyo hwi synde ge hire grame. god werc hyo on me worhte.
Soðlice symble ge hæbbed þearfen mid eow. & þanne ge willeð ge magen heom tæle don. me ge symble næbbeð.
þeos sealde þt hyo hæfde. hyo com to smeriene minne lichame on berigenne.
Soðlice ich eow segge swa hwær swa þis godspell ge-boded byo on eallen midden-earde byð ge-boded þt hyo þis on his ge-minde dyde.
Ða iudas scarioth þt is wiðersace an of þam twelfen ferde to þam heah-sacerden þt he hine heom be-leawde.
Ða hyo þis ge-herden hyo fageneden & be-heton him feoh to syllene. & he smaigde hu he hine digelice sealde.
And þam formen daige azimorum. þa hyo eastren offredon. his leorning-cnihtes him saiden hwider wilt þu þt we faren. & ge-gærewian þe þt þu eastren æte.
Þa sende he twegen of his leorning-cnihten & sæden heom. Gað on þas cestre & ginc ägen yrnð sum man berende sume wæter-flaxan. Folgieð him.
& swa hwider swa he ingað segged þas huses hlaferde. Ure lareow sægð hwær is min gyst-hus & min ge-reord. hwær æte ic eastren mid minen leorning-cnihten.
And he inc ge-swuteleð micele halle ge-þefte. & ge-gerewiað us þare.
þa ferden his leorning-cnihtes & comen on þare cestre & funden hit eall swa he saigde. & ge-garewedon þa eastren.
Soðlice þa æfen com heom twelf mid him.
sittende. & etende sæde se hælend. Soðlice ic eow segge. þt eower an þe mid me æt ge-syld me.
þa ongunnen hio beo dreorige. & be-twuxe heom cwæðen. cwedst þu eom ic hit.
Ða sæde he heom. an of eow twelfen me sylð. Se þe his hand on disce mid me dypd.
Ænd witodlice mannes sune gað swa be hym awriten is. Wa þam men þurh þane þe mannes sune beoð ge-seald. betere hym wære þt se man akenned nære.
Heom þa ætende afeng se hælend hlaf. & hine bletsiende bræc. & sealde heom & þus cwæð. nymed þis is min lichame.
& onfeng calice & gode þances dyde. & sealde heom. & ealle heon ofdruncen.
Ða saide he heom þis is min blod þare nywe cyðnissan. þt beoð for manigen agoten.
Soðlice ic eow segge þt ic henen forð ne drince of þises win-geardes kynne. oððe þanne daig þanne ic hine neowe drince on godes rice.
Ænd ge-cweðenen lofe hyo ferdon on ele-bergene munt.
Þa  se hælend ealle ge beoð ge-untreowsede on þisse nihte. for þam þe hit awriten is. ic slea þanne heorde. & beoð þa scep to-dræfde.
Ac æfter þan þe ic arise ic cume be-foren eow. on galilea.
Þa saide petrus him. þeah þe ealle swician. ne swicige ic þe nä.
Ða cwæð se hælend. Soðlice ic þe segge. þt þu on þisen nihte ær coc twewe cræwe þreowe wið-sæcst min.
& he þæs þe mare spæc. & þah me ge-berige mid þe to sweltene. ne æt-sace ic þin. & swa hyo cwæðen ealle.
Ða comen hyo to anen tune þas nama wæs getsemani. & he cwæð to his leorning-cnihten. Sitteð her oð þt ic me ge-bidde.
& he nam þa mid him petrum & iacobum. & iohannem þa on-gan he forhtigen & sarigen.
& sæde heom. Vnrot is min sawle odðe deað ge-biddeð her & wakieð.
Ða he lithwon forð-stop. he astrehte hine ofer þa eorðan & ge-bæd. gyf hit beon mihte. þt he on þare tide fram him ge-wite.
& þa . he. abba. þt is fader on ure ge-þeode alle þing þe sende mihtilice afyrre þisne calic fram me. ac na þt ic wille äc þt þu.
Ða com he & funde hyo slæpende. & cwæð to petre. Simon slæpst þu. ne mihtest þu ane tide wacien.
wacieð & ge-biddað þt ge on costnunge ne gan. witodlice se gast is geare. ac þt flæsc is untrum.
And eft he ge-bæd þa ylcen spæce.
& þa he hine eft agen be-wende. he funde hyo slæpende. heore eagen wæren ge-hefegede. & hyo nyston hwæt hyo him andswereden.
Þa com he ðriddan siðe. & sæde heom slæpeð nu & resteð ge-noh hit is. time is cumen nu is mannes sune ge-seald on synfulre hande.
arised uten gan. nu is ge-hende se þe me syld.
him þa þe gyt spræcende com iudas scarioth þt is wiðer-saca. an of þam twelfen. & mid him mycel manige. mid sweorden & mid sahlen. fram heah-sacerden & bokeren & ealdren.
Soðlice his læwa heom taken sealde & þus cwæð. Swa hwilcne swa ic kysse. se hit ys nymeð & lædeð hine wærlice.
& sone swa he com he ge-nehlacte hine to & cwæð. Lareow; & cyste hine.
& hyo heore hande on hine wurpen & namen hine.
Soðlice an of þam þe þær embe-uten stoden his sweord abræd. & slog þas sacerdes þeow. & his eare of acarf.
Ða cwæð se hælend heom and-sweriende. Swa swa to anen scæðan ge ferden mid sweorden & treowen me ge-fon.
þanne ic daig-hwamlice mid eow wæs on temple lærende & ge me namen. ac þt þa ge-write syen ge-fellde.
Ða for-leten his leorning cnihtes ealle hine & flugen.
Sum gungling him fylgde mid ane scytan be-wæfed nacod. & hy name hine.
þt wærpendre þare scete nacod he heom fram fleah.
& hy lædden þanne hælend to þam heah-sacerde ænd comen ealle þa sacerdes. ænd bokeres. & ealdres. to-gædere.
Petrus heom felgede ferren oð þas heah-sacerdes cæfertun. and he set mid þam þenum & wermden hine æt þam fyre.
Ða heah-sacerdas sohten & eall ge-þeaht. tale agen þanne hælend. þt hyo hine to deaðe sealden & hyo ne fundon.
Manege sæden lease cyðnyssen agen hine. & þa cyðnisse næren þas-lice.
Ða arise sume & saigden lease cydnysse agen hine & þus cwæðen.
Sodes we ge-hyrden hine seggen ic to-weorpe þis hand-worhte temple. & æfter þrem dagen ic oðer un-hand-worht ge-timbrige.
& heore cydnysse næs þas-gelic.
Ða aras sum heah-sacerd on heora midlene & acxode þanne hælend. Ne andswerest þu nan þing agen þt þas þe onweorped.
he swegede & naht ne andswerede. Eft hine axode se heah-sacerd. Ert þu crist. Þas ge-bletsedes godes sune.
Þa sæde se hælend ic eom. & ge ge-seoð mannes sune on swiðren healfe sitten. his maignes. & cumende mid heofenes ge-nipen.
Ða cwæð se heah-sacerd his reaf slytende. hwi wilnige we gyt cyðera.
ge ge-herden his bismer. hwæt þincð eow. Ða hyrden hyo ealle hine & cwæðen. þt he wære deaðes scyldig.
Ænd sume agunnen hym on spæten. & ofer-wreon his ansiene. & mid festen hine beaten. & him to cwæðen. Ared. & þa þenas hine mid handen beoten.
& þa petrus wæs on cæfertune þa com to him an þinen þas heah-sacerdes.
& þa hye ge-seah petrum wermende þa cwæð hy. Þu wære mid þam nazareiscen hælende.
Ða æt-soc he & cwæð. Ic nat ne ic kan hwæt þu saigst. & he eode þa of þam cæfertune & se coc creow.
Eft þa hine cneow oðer þinen. & hyo on-gan cweðen to þam þe þær abuten stoden. Soðlice þes is of þam.
& he eft æt-soc. Ænd eft þa embe litel þa þe eft stoden cwæðen to petre. Soðlice þu ert of þam galileisc þu ert.
Ða æt-gan he of-sacan. & swerien. soðes ne can ic þanne man þe ge seggeð.
& þa eft sone creow se coc. Ða ge-munde petrus þas hælendes word þe he him saide. ær se coc creowe twige. þrewe þu me æt-sæcst. þa on-gan he wepen.
Ða sone on morgen worhten þa heah-sacerdes heore ge-mot. mid ealdren & boceren. & eallen werede & lædden þane halend ge-bunden & sealden hine pilaten.
Ða axode pilatus hine eart þu iudea kining. Ða andswerede he hym. Ðu hit sægst.
Þa wreiden hine þa heah-sacerdes. on manegen þingen.
Eft pilatus hine axode ne andswerest þu nan þing. loca hu mycelen hyo þe wreigeð.
Ða ne andswerede se hælend him nam mare swa þæt pilatus wundrede.
On sym-mel-daig wæs his ge-wune. þt he heom for-gefe ænne bundenne swa hwilcne swa hyo bæden.
Ða bæden hyo barraban. se wæs ge-bunden mid þam replingen. se þurh swice-cræft man-slyht worhten.
& þa he ferde þa on-gan syo manigeo hine biddan swa hy symle dyden.
Ða cwæð pilatus. Wille ge þt ic eow for-gefe iudea kyning.
he wiste þt þurh ande hine sealden þa heah-sacerdas.
Ða astireden þa biscoppes þa manige þt he heom barraban for-gefe.
Eft pilatus him andswerede. hwæt do ic be iudea kyninge.
hyo eft grætten & cwæðen. hoh hine.
Þa saigde pilatus. hwæt yfeles dyde he. hyo þas þe ma cleopeden ahoh hine.
Pilatus wolde þa þam folce ge-cwemen. & for-gef heom barraban. & sealde heom þanne hælend be-swungen þt he ahangen wære.
Þa lædden þa cempen hine on þas domernes cæfertun & hyo to-gædere ealle wered cleopeden.
& scridden hine mid purpren & him on setten þernene helm awundene.
& on-gunnen hine þus greten. hal beo þu iudea kyning.
& beoton hine on þt heafeð mid reode & spetten him on & hire cneow beigden & hine ædmetten.
Ænd syððen hyo hine bismeredon. un-scriddan hine þam purpran. & scriddan hine mid his reafen. & lædden hine þæt hyo hine ahengen.
& ge-nedden sumne weig-ferende symonem cyreneum cumende of þam tune alisandres fader & ruffi. þt he his rode bære.
& hyo lædden hine on þam stowe golgotha. þt is on ure þeode ge-reht heafed-panna stowa.
& sealden him ge-bytered win & he hit ne on-feng.
And þa hyo hine ahengen hyo dælden his reaf & hlote wurpen. hwæt ge-hwa name.
Ða wæs under-tid. & hyo ahengen hine.
& ofer-ge-writ his geltes wæs awriten iudea kyng.
& hyo ahengen mid him twegen scaðen ænne on his swiðeren healfe. & oðerne on his winstren.
þa wæs þt ge-writ ge-fylled þt cwæð. & he wæs mid unriht-wisan ge-teald.
And þa þe forð-stopen hine gremedon & hyra heafod cwehten. & þus cwæðen. Wala se to-werpð þt tempel. & on ðrim dagen eft ge-tymbred.
ge-hæl þe sylfne of þare rode stigende.
Eal swa þa heah-sacerdas bysmeriende be-twexe þam bokeren cwæðen. odre he hæle ge-dyde. hine sylfne he ne maig halne don.
Crist israele kyng astig nu of rode þt we ge-seon & ge-lefen. And þa þe mid him ahangeden wæren him mid ge-bundene.
And þare syxte tide wurðe þeostre ge-worðene geond ealle eorðan. odðe non-tide.
And to non-tide se hælend clepede mycele stefne heloy heloy lama sabathani. þt is on ure ge-þeode. min god min god. hwi for-lædst þu me.
& sume þe þær abuton stoden & þis ge-hyrdon hyo cwæðen. nu þes clyped heliam.
þa arn hyre an. & fylde ane spunge mid eisile. & on reod sette & him drincen sealde. & cwæð. læteð þt we ge-seon hwæðer helias cume hine niðer to settenne.
Se hælend þa asende his stefne & forð-ferde.
Ænd þas temples wah-irift wæs to-sliten on twa of ufewearden odðe niðeweard.
Ða þas hundredes man þe þær stod agen ge-seah þt se hælend swa clepiende forð-ferde. he cwæð. Soðlice þes man wæs godes sune.
And þa wif wæren feorren be-healdende. & betwux þam wæs sie magdalenisce Marie. & Marie iacobes moðer & salomëë.
& þa he wæs on galilëë hy felgden hym. & him þenoden & manege oðre þe him mide ferden on ierusalem.
Ænd þa æfen wæs ge-worden þt wæs parasceue. þt is ær sæterdaige
þa com iosep se æðele refe of arimathia se sylfe godes rice ge-an-bidode. & he dyrstilice in to pilate eode & bæd þas hælendes lichame.
Þa wundrede pilatus gyf he þa gyt forð-ferde. Ða clypede he þanne hundredes man. & hine axode hwæðer he dead wære.
Ða he wiste þt. þa agyf he þane lic-hame iosepe.
Ða bohte iosep ane scytan & hine þær-on be-feold & on byrigenne leigde syo wæs of stane aheawan. & wyltel ænne stan to þare berienne dure.
Þa com Marie magdalene & Iosepes Marie. & be-heolden hwær he ge-leigd wære.
& þa saternes daig wæs agan sye magdalenisce Marie & Iacobes Marie & salomëë bohten wert-ge-mang þt hyo comen & hine smereden.
Ænd swiðe ær anen reste-daige comen to þare byregenne up asprungenne sunna.
& cwæðen heom be-tweonen. hwa awylt us þysne stan of þare byregene dure.
Þa hyo hy be-seagen. hyo ge-seagen þane stan aweig aweldne. soðlice he wæs swiðe mycel.
Ænd þa hyo eoden on þa byregenne hyo ge-seagen ænne geongne on þam swiðren healfe sittende hwiten gerlen ofer-wrogene. & hyo þa forhteden.
Þa  he to heom ne fortige ge na. ge seceð þane nazarenisca hælend ahangene. he aras. nis he her. her is syo stowe þær hy hine leigden.
ac fareð & seggeð his leorning-cnihten. & petre. þt he gæd to-foren eow on galilee. Þær ge hine ge-seoð swa he eow sæde.
& hyo ut eoden & flugen fram þare byrigene. & wæren aferde. for þare sihðe þe hyo ge-seagen. & hyo nane men naht ne saigden. soðlice hyo heom an-dredden.
Þa he aras on ærne morgen on reste-daige; ærest he atewde þare magdalenisca marie of þare þe he ut adraf seofen deofel-seocnysse.
& hy þa ut eode & hit þam cydde þe mid him wæren heofende & weopende.
þa hyo ge-hyrden þt he leofede & hyo hine ge-seagen. þa ne lyfden hyo him.
Æfter þam heom twam he wæs atewed on oðren heowe. heom on þane tun farende.
& hyo þa foran. & þt odren cydden. & hye heom ne ge-lyfden.
Ða æt þan ytemesten hyo ænd-lefene æt mete sæten. heom atewede se hælend & here unbelefen & heora heorten ge-tremede. for-þan þt hye hine ge-seagen arise hi hit ne ge-lyfden.
& he saide heom. Gað swa wid swa midden-eard bodiende þt godspel ealle ge-scefte.
þt se þe ge-lyfd & is ge-funted he is hal. & ge se þe ne ge-lyfd he is for-demd.
Þa tacnen þe hæbbed þa þe ge-lyfeð þis folgeð. On mine name deofle gad ut. tungen spreced neowe.
& naddren be-nemed. & gyf he deadlice drenc drinced ne mag he heom derigen. & gyf hye uppen seocen here hande asetteð þe bet heom scel wurðe.
& ure hlaford hælend crist seððen he wið heom ge-sprecen hæfde; he astah in to heofene & sitt on godes swiðre.
Hyo þa fulfelde bodeden swa wid swa al. þas hlafordes weorces & his bispelles fulfellende mid felgenden tacnen. AMen.
for þan þe witodlice manega þohte þare þinge race ge-ende-berden þe on us ge-fylde synde;
swa us be-tahten þa þe hyt of fremðe ge-sægen. & þare spræce þëenæs wæren.
Me ge-þuhte geornlice eallen oð ænde-byrdnysse writen þe þu seleste theophilus.
þt þu oncnawe þare worde sodfæstnysse of þam þe þu ge-læred ært.
On herode dagen iudea cyninges wæs sum sacerd on namen zacharias of abian tune. & his wif wæs of äärones dohtren. & hire name wæs elisabeth.
Soðlice hyo wæren ba twa rihtwise be-foren gode. & gangenden on eallen hys beboden & rihtwisnesse. ba twa wrohte.
& hyo nafden nan bearn. for-ðan elisabeth wæs un-berende & hyo on heore dagen baðe forð-eoden.
Soðlice wæs ge-worðen þa zacharias hys sacerd-hades brea. on his ge-wrixles endebyrdnysse be-fore gode.
æfter ge-wunan. þara sacerdes hades hlotes he eode þæt he his offringe sette. Ða he on godes tempel eode
eall wered þas folkes wæs ute biddende on þare offrenge timen.
Ða atewede hym drihtenes ængel standende on þas weofedes swiðren healfe.
Þa warð zacharias ge-drefed þæt ge-seonde & him eige on-reas.
Ða cwæð se ængel hym to. ne on-dred þu þe zacharias. for þan þin bene is ge-herd. & þin wif elisabeth þe sune kenð. & þu nemnest hys name Iohannes
& he byð þe to blisse. & manega on his akynnednysse ge-fageneð.
Soðlice he byð mære be-foren drihtene. & he ne drincð win ne beor. & he beoð ge-felleð mid halgen gaste; Þanne gyt of hys moder innoðe.
& manege israele bearne he ge-chyrd to drihtene heore gode
& he gæð to-foren him on gaste. & on helias ge-mihte. & he fæderan heortan to heora bearnan ge-cyrre. & ungeleafulle. to rihtwise gleaw-scipe. drihtne fulfremed folc ge-gærewian.
Ða cwæð zacharias to þam engle. hwanan wat ich þis. Ic eom nu eald & min wif on heora dagen forð-eode.
Þa andswerede him se ængel. Ich eom gabriel se engel. ic þe stande be-foren gode. & ich eom asend wið þe sprecen. & þe þis bodien.
End nu abydst swigende. & þu spræken ne miht oð þanne dayg þe þas þing gewurðad. for þan þu mine worden ne lyfdest þa byð on heora timan ge-fylde.
And þæt folc wæs zachariam ge-abydende. & wundredon. þæt he on þæt temple ge-læt wæs.
Ða he ut-eode ne mihte he heom to spræcen. & hyo on-cneowen þæt he on þam temple sume ge-sihte ge-seah. & he wæs beacniende heom & dumb þurh-wunede.
Þa wæs ge-worðen þa his þenunga dages ge-fylde wæren. he ferde to his huse.
Soðlice æfter dagen elisabeth his wif ge-eacnode. & hy be-dyglede hyo fif monðas & cwæð.
Soðlice me drihten ge-dyde þus on þam dagen þe he ge-seah mine hosp be-twux mannen afyrran.
Soðlice on þam syxten monðe wæs a-send gabriel se engel fram drihtene on galilëë cestre þare name wæs nazareth.
to be-weddedre femnen anen were þas name wæs ioseph of dauiðes huse. & þare femne name wæs mariam.
Ða cwæð se ængel ingangende. Hal wæsse þu mid gyfe ge-fylled. drihten mid þe. Þu ert ge-bletsed on wifen.
þa warð hyo on his spræce ge-drefed. & þohte hwæt syo gretunge wære.
Ða cwæð se ængel. ne on-dræd þu þe Maria. Soðlice þu gyfe mid gode ge-mettest
soðlice nu þu on innoðe ge-eacnest. & sune censt ænd hys name hælend ge-nemnest
& se byoð mære. & þas heagestes sune ge-nemned. & hym sylð drihten god his fæder dauides setll.
& he rixad on echnesse on Iacobes huse. & his riche ænde ne beoð.
Þa cwæð maria to þam ængle hu ge-wurð þis for þan ich were ne on-cnawe.
Ða andswerede hyre se ængel. Se halge gast on þe be-kymd & þas heagestan mihte þe ofer-scædeð. & for þan þt halig þe of þe akenned byð; byð godes sune ge-nemned.
Ænd nu elisabeth þin mage sune on hire elde ge-echnede. & þes moneð is hire syxto sye is unberende ge-nemned.
for-þy nis ælch word mid gode unmihte-lic.
Ða cwæð Maria. Her is drihtenes þinen. ge-wurðe me æfter þinen worde. & se ængel hire fram ge-wat.
Soðlice on þam dagen aras Maria & ferde on muntlande mid efste. on iudeisse ceastre.
& eode in-to zacharias huse. & grette elisabeth.
Ða wæs ge-worðen. þa helisabeth ge-herde maRie gretinge. þa ge-fagene þæt chyld on hire innoðe. ænd þa warð elisabeth halgen gaste ge-fylled.
ænd hyo cleopede hludere stefne. & cwæð. Ðu ært be-twux wifen ge-bledsed. & ge-bletsed ys þines innoðes wæstme.
& hwanen is me þis þæt mines drihtenes moder scolde to me cume.
Sone swa þinre gretinge stefne on minan earen ge-worðan wæs. þa fagenede min chyld on minen innoðe.
Ænd eadig þu ert þu þe ge-lyfdest þæt fulfremede sinde þa þing. þe þe fram drihtene ge-saigde synde.
Ða cwæð maria min saule mersed drihten.
and min gast ge-blissode on gode minen hælende.
For þam þe he ge-seah his þinene eadmodnysse. Soðlice henen-forð me eadige seggeð ealle cneornesse.
for þam þe me mychele þing dyde se þe mihtyg ys. & his name is halig
& hys mildheortnysse of cneornisse. on cneornesse hine on-drædende.
He worhte mægne on hys earme. he to-dælde þa ofermode. on moda heora heortan.
He warp þa rice of setlle. & þa eadmode he up an-hof.
Hyngriende he mid gode ge-felde. & þa ofor-mode ydele for-let.
He afeng israel his cniht & ge-mynde hys mildheortnysse.
Swa he spræc to ure fæderen abrahame. & his sæde on a weorlde.
Soðlice Marie wunede mid hire swylce þreo monðes; & ge-wende þa to hire huse.
Ða wæs afelled elisabethe kenning-tyd. & hyo sune kende.
ænd hire nehcheburas & hyre cuðan þæt ge-herden þæt drihten hys mildheortnysse mid hire mærsede. & hyo mid hire blisseden.
Þa on þam ehtode daige hyo comon þæt chyld to embscniðen. & nemden hine his fæder name zachariam.
Þa andswerede his moder nese soðes. ac he beoð Iohan ge-nemned.
Ða cwæðen hyo to hire. nis nan on þinre mægðe þisse name ge-nemned.
Ða cwæðen hyo to his fæder. hwæt he wolde hine ge-nemned beon.
þa wrat he ge-beðenen wexbrede Iohannes ys hys name. Ða wundredon hyo ealle.
Ða warð sona hys muð & hys tunge ge-opened & he spræc drihten bletsiende.
Ða warð eige ge-worden ofer ealle heora nehchegeburas & ofer ealle iudea munt-land wæren þas worð wið-mærsede.
& ealle þa þe hyt ge-hyrdon on heore heorten setten & cwæðen. Wenst þu hwæt beoð þes cnapa; witoðlice drihtnes hand wæs mid hym.
Ænd zacharias hys fæder wæs mid halgen gaste ge-fylled. & he wito-gode. & cwæð.
Ge-bletseð syo drihten israele god; for þan þe he ge-neosede. & hys folces alysendnysse dyde.
Ænd he us hæle horn arærde on dauides huse. hys cnihtes.
Swa he spræc þurh hys halgene witegene muð. Ða þe of weorldes fremðe spræken.
& he alesde us of uren feonden. & of ealre þare handen þe us hateden.
Mildheortnysse to werchen mid ure fæderen. & ge-munen hys halgen kyðnesse.
hyne us to sellene þanne að þe he uren fader abrahame swor.
þæt we buton eyge of ure feondon handen alesde hym þeowian.
on halignesse be-foran hym eallen ure dagen.
& þu cnapa gæst & beost þas heageste witega ge-nemned. Ðu gæst be-foran drihtnes ansiene hys wegas gearewian.
To syllene hys folce his halge ge-wit on hira synna for-gefenyssa.
Ðurh innoðes ures godes mildheortnyssa. on þam he us neosede. of east-dæle up-springende.
on-lihtan þam þe on þeostrum & on deaðes scade sitteð. ure fet to ge-reccenne on sibbe weig.
Soðlice se cnape weox. & wæs on gaste ge-stræncþed. & wæs on westene oð þanne dayg his atewednysse on israel.
Soðlice on þam dagen wæs ge-worðen ge-bod fram þan caisere auguste. þæt eall ymb-hwyrft wære to-mærcod.
Ðeos to-mearcednysse wæs ærest ge-worðen. fram þan deman syrige cyrino.
& ealle hyo eoden & syndrie ferden on heore ceastre.
Ða ferde ioseph fram galilea. of þare ceastre nazareht. on iudeissce ceastre. dauiðes syo is ge-nemned bethlëëm. for þan þe he wæs of dauiðes huse & hyrde
þæt he ferde mid marian þe hym ge-wedded wæs. & wæs ge-eacnod.
Soðlice wæs ge-worðan þa hyo þær wæren. hyre dages wæren ge-fyllede þæt hyo kende
& hyo þa akende hire frum-kennedan sunu. & hine mid cyld-claþen be-wand. & hine on binne alegde. for þan þe hyo næfden rum on cumene huse.
Ænd heordas wæren on þam ylcan riche wakiende. & niht-wæccen healdende ofer heore heorda.
Þa stod drihtnes ængel wið hyo & godes brihtnysse heom ymbe-scan; & hyo heom mychel eige adredden.
& se engel heom to cwæð. Nelle ge eow on-dræden. soðlice nu ich eow bodige mychele blisse syo beoð eallen folce.
for þan to dayg eow is hælend akenned. se is drihten crist on dauiðes ceastre.
And þis taken eow beoð. Ge findað an chyld ræglen be-wunden. & on binne aleigð.
And þa wæs færinge ge-worðan mid þam ængle myceles heofenlices weredes god heriendra. & þus cweðende
gode syo wuldor on heahnysse. & on eorðan sibbe mannen godes willan.
& hyt wæs ge-worðen þa þa ængles to heofene ferden. Þa heordan heom be-tweonen spræcen & cwæðen. Vton faren to bethlëëm. & ge-seon þæt word þe ge-worðen ys. þæt drihten us atywede.
& hyo efstende comen & ge-metton marian & Ioseph ænd þæt chyld on binne aleigd.
Ða hyo þæt ge-seagen þa on-cneowen hyo be þam worden þe heom ge-sæd wæs. be þam chylde.
Ænd ealle þa þe ge-herden wundreden be þam. þe heom þa heordes saigdon.
Maria ge-heold ealle þas word on hire heorte smeagende.
Ða ge-wenden ham þa heordes god wuldriende. & heriende on eallen þan þe hyo ge-herden & ge-seagen. Swa to heom ge-cweðen wæs.
Æfter þam þe ehta dages ge-felde wæren þt þæt chyld embsnyðen wære. Hys nama wæs hælend. Se wæs fram ængle ge-nemned ær he on innoðe ge-eacned wære.
Æfter þam þe hire clænsing-dages ge-felde wæren. æfter moyses lage. hyo lædden hine on ierusalem þæt hyo hine gode setton
swa swa  drihtnes lage awriten ys. Ðæt ælc wæpnyd ge-cyndlym untynende beoð drihtenes halig ge-nemned.
& þæt hyo offrunge sealden. æfter þan þe drihtnes læge ge-cweðen is. twa turtlan. oððe twa culfran briddes.
Ænd þa wæs an man on ierusalem þas name wæs symeon. & þes man wæs rihtwis & mid israele frofren ge-anbadiende. & halig gast him on wæs.
& he andswere of þam halgen gaste on-feng. þæt he deað ne ge-seage buton he ær drihten crist ge-seage.
Ænd on gaste he on þæt tempel com. & þa his mæges læddon þanne hælend. þt hyo for hym æfter þare læge ge-wunan dyden.
Heo on-feng hine mid hys handen. & god bletsede. & cwæð.
Drihten nu þu lætst þinne þeow æfter þine worde on sibbe.
for þam mine eagen ge-seagen þine hæle.
þa þu ge-gearwudest be-foran alre folce ansiene.
leoht to þeoda awrigenysse. & to þines folces wuldre israele.
Þa wæs hys fæder & hys moder wundriende be þam þe be hym ge-saigde wæren.
And þa ge-bletsede hyo symeon. & cwæð to marian hys moder. loca nu þes is on hryre & on arist ge-sett. manegre on israele & on taken þam þe wið-cweðen byð.
Ænd his sweord þine sawle þurhferð. þæt ge-þohtes seon awrigene of manegen heorten.
And anna wæs witegestre fanueles dohter of asseres mægðe. þeos wunede manigene daig & hye lefede mid hire were sefe gear on hire femnehade
& hyo wæs wudewe oð feower & hund-eahtetig geare. Seo of þam temple ne ge-wat daiges ne nihtes. þeowiende on fæstene. & on halsunge.
And þeos þare tide be-cumende drihtne andette & be hym spræc. eallen þan þe ge-an-bided-en ierusalem alysednysse.
& þa hyo ealle þing ge-feldon æfter drihtenes lage. hyo hwurfon on galilëë on hire ceastre nazareth.
Soðlice þæt chyld weox & wæs gestranged wisdomes full. & godes geue wæs on him.
& his mæges ferden ælche geare to ierusalem on eastre daiges freols-tide.
Ða he wæs twelf wintre. hyo foren to ierusalem to þam easterlicen freolse. æfter hyre ge-wunenen (sic).
& þa ge-fylleden dagen. þa hyo agen ge-hwurfon be-laf se hælend on ierusalem & hys mæges þæt nyston.
wende þæt he on heore ge-ferrede wære. Ða comen hyo anes daiges feor. & hyo hine sohte be-twe oxe his mæges & hys cuðan.
þa hyo hine ne funden; hyo ge-wenton to ierusalem hine sechende.
Ða æfter þreom dagen. hyo funden hine on þam temple sittende. on middan þam lareowan. hlystende & hyo axiende.
Ða wundredon hyo ealle þe ge-hyrden be his gleawscype; & his ændsweren.
Ða cwæð his moder to him. Sune hwi dydest þu unc þus. þin fæder & ïc sarigende þe sohten.
Þa cwæð he to heom. hwæt is þæt gyt me sohten. nyste gyt þæt me ge-byred to beonne on þam þingen þe mines fæder synde.
Ða ne on-geaton hyo þa word þe he to heom spræc.
Ða ferde he mid heom & com to nazareth. & wæs heom under-þeod. And hys moder ge-heold ealle þas word on hire heorte smeagende.
Ænd se hælend þeah on wisdome & on ylde. & mid gyfe mid gode & mid mannen.

Soðlice þam fiftendan geare þas caiseres an-wealdes tyberij. be-ginnenden þam pontiscen pilate iudea þeode. foerðan dæles rice galilëë herode. philippe hys broder. feorðan dæles rice iturie. & þas riche traconitidis. & lisania abiline feorðan dæles rica.
under þare sacerde ealdres anna & chaifa. godes word wæs ge-worðan ofer zacharias sune on westene.
& he com into eall Iordanes riche bodiende. deadbote fulluht & synne for-gyfenesse
swa hit awriten ys on ysaias bech þas witegan. Clepiende stefn on westene. ge-garewiað drihtenes weig dod his siðas rihte.
Ælch dane beoð ge-feld. & ælch munt & beorh beoð ge-niðered. & þwuru beoð on ge-rihte. & ungerydu on smeðe weges.
& ælc flæsc ge-sihð godes hæle.
Soðlice he cwæð to þam mægen þe ferden þæt hyo wæren fullode fram hym. Eale næddrene kyn hwa atewedo (sic) eow þæt ge fleon fram þam towearde eorre.
Doð eornestlice deadbote wæstmes. & ne on-ginnen ge cweðen. we hæbbed us to fader abraham. Ich segge eow þæt god is swa mihtig þæt he maig of þisen stanen abrahames bearn aweccan.
Nu ys syo æx asett. to þas treowas wirtrumen. Witodlice ælch treow þe ne brincd godne wæstme beoð for-corfan & on fyr aworpen.
Ða axoden hine þa manige & cwæðen; hwæt do we.
Þa cwæð he to heom. se þe hafð twege tunekan. sylle þam þe næfð. & þam ge-lice do se þe metes hæfð
Ða comen þa manfulle þæt hy aþwegene wæren. & cwæðen to hym lareow hwæt do we.
Þa cwæð he ne do ge naht mare þanne þæt eow ge-sett ys.
Ða axoseden (sic) hine þa cempan & cwæðen. & hwæt do we. Þa sæde he heom. ne sla ge nanne man. Ne täle ne doð. & beoð eð-healde on eowren andlyfenum.
Soðlice þam folce wenenden & eallen on heore heorten þencenden be Iohanne hwæder he crist wære.

Ða andswerede Iohannes heom eallen seggenden. Witodlice ic eow an watere fullige. Soðlice kymð strengre þanne ich; þas ich nem wurðe þæt ich hys scoþwang un-cnytte. Heo eow fulled on halgen gaste. & on fyre.
& his fann is on his handa. & he fermed hys bernes flore. & gadered hys hwæte in-to hys berne. þæt chæf he for-bernð on un-acwenctelice fyre.
Manega oðre þing bodiende. He þæt folc lærde.
Herodes se feorðan dæles rica þa he wæs fram him ge-þread. be þare herodiscan his broder wife & be eallen yfelen þe herodes dyde.
& ofer eall þæt ge-icte þæt he be-clysde Iohanne on cwarterne.
Soðlice wæs ge-worðan þa eall þæt folc wæs ge-fullod. & þam hælende ge-fulloden & ge-biddenden. heofene wæs ge-opened
& se halga gast astah lichamlicere an-syna on hine swa an culfre & stefne wæs of heofene ge-worðan & þus cwæð. Ðu ert min ge-corena sune on þe me ge-likeð.
& se hælend wæs on ylde swilce þrittige wintre. þæt men wenden þæt he wære Iosepes sune. Se wæs heliges sune.
se wæs nazareth. swa of cneornysse on cneornysse oððe adam. Se wæs godes sunu oð fif & hund-seofentig cneornisse.
Soðlice se hælend wæs full halgen gaste & ferde fram iordane.  Se halend wæs fram halig gaste ge-læd on sumen westene
feortig dagen. & wæs fram deofol costnod. & he on þam dagen nan þing ne æt. And þam dagen ge-fylleden hine hingrede.
Þa cwæð se deofel hym to. gyf þu syo godes sunu. sæge þisen stanen þæt he to hlafe ge-wurðe.
Ða andswerede him se hælend. Hit ys awriten þæt se man ne leofeð be hlafe anen. äc of ælcen godes worde.
And þa lædde se deofel hyne & atewede him ealle þa rice eorðe ymbhwyrftes on anre brihtan hwile.
& to him cwæð. Ealne þisne anweald ic þe sylle & heora wuldor for þan þe hy me synde ge-sealde. & ich hye sylle þan þe ich wille.
Witodlice ealle hyo beoð þine gif þu ge-eadmedest be-foran me.
Ða andswerede him se halend. Hit is awriten. Drihten þinne god þu ge-eadmest & hym ane þeowast.
Ða lædde he hyne on Ierusalem. & ge-sette hine ofer þas temples ricg & hym to cwæð. Gyf þu syo godes sunu ä-send þe heonen nyder.
Soðlice hit ys awriten þæt he hys ænglen be þe be-beot þt hyo þe ge-healden;
& þt hyo þe mid handen nymen þe læs þe þu þinne fot æt stane æt-sperne.
Ða cwæð se hælend him andsweriende. hyt is ge-cweðen ne costa þu drihten þinne god.
& ealle þare costlinge ge-fylledera. se deofel hym sume hwile fram ge-wat.
Þa ferde se hælend on gastes mægne on galileam. & his hlise be him ferde on eall þæt riche.
& he lærde be heora samnunge. & wæs fram eallen ge-mearsod.
Ða com he to nazareth. þær he afed wæs. & he eode on reste-däige on þa ge-samnenge æfter his ge-wunen. & he aras þt he rædde.
& hym wæs ge-seald ysaias boc þas witegan. & sona swa he þa boc unfeld þa funde he þær awriten;
drihtnes gast is ofer me for þan he smerede me. He sende me þærfen bodian. & ge-hæften alysendnysse. & blinden ge-sihðe. for-brokene ge-hælen.
& bodian drihtnes anfenge gear & edleanes daig.
And þa he þa boc be-feold he hye þam þeigne sealde & agef & sæt. & ealre hire eagen on þare samnunge wæren on hine be-healdende.
Ða on-gan he heom to cwædene. Soðlice to daig ys þis writ on eowren earen ge-fylled.
& hyo ealle wæren þis ge-cnawe & wundredon be þam worden þe of hys muðe eode. & þus cwæðen. Nis þes Iosepes sune.
Þa cwæð he. Witodlice ge seggeð me þas ge-licnysse. eala leche ge-hæl þe sylfne. Do her on þinen earde swa fela wundre swa we ge-hyrden ge-döne on chapharnaum.
Ða cwæð he. soðlice ic eow segge þæt nan witege nis and-fenge on hys æðele.
Soðlice ic eow segge manega wudewan wæren on helias dagon on israel. þa þa seo heofena wæs be-loken þreo gear & six monþas. Þa wæs ge-worðan mycel hunger on ealre eorðan
& to þare nanun næs helias asend. buton to anre wudewan on sarepta sydonie.
And manega lichþrowæres wæron on israel under helyseo þam witegan; & heore nan næs æclænsed butan nääman se scirescan.
Þa wurðen hyo ealle on þare ge-samnunge mid eorre ge-fylled. þas þing ge-herende.
ænd hyo arison & scufen hine of þare ceastre. ænd lædden hine ofer þas muntes cnæp ofer þane hyra burh ge-tymbred wæs þæt hyo hine nyðer be-scufan.
þa ferde he þurh hyra midlen.
And he ferde to kapharnaum on galileisce ceastre. & he þær on ræste-daigen lærde.
& hyo wundreden be his lare; for þan hys spræce on anwealde wæs.
And on hire samnunge wæs sum man un-clæne deofol hæbbende. & he hrymde michelere stefne
& cwæð. Læt la nazareisce hælend. hwæt is us & þe come þu us to for-spillene. ich wat þæt þu ert godes halga.
And þa cydde hym se hælend and cwæd. Adumba & ga hym of. & þa he ut adraf hine on hire midlene; & he hym fram ge-wat. and hym naht ne derede.
Ða wurðen hyo ealle forhte & spraeken heom be-tweonen. & cwæðen hwæt is þæt word þæt he on mihte & on mægne un-clænen gaste be-beot. & hyo ut gað.
Ða wæs hys hlise ge-wid-mærsod on ælcere stowe þas rices.
Soðlice he aras of here samnunga & ferde on symones hus. Ða wæs simones sweger ge-swenched on mycelen feofren. & hyo hine for hire bæden.
& he standende ofer hyo þam feofre be-bead. & he hyo for-let. & hyo sone aras. & hym þenede.
Soðlice þa sunne asah ealle þe untrume wæren on mistlicen adlen hyo lædden him to. & he sindrigen his hand on-settende hyo ge-helde.
Þa ferden þa deofle of manegen hremende. & cweðende. Sodes þu eart godes sune. & he ne ge-þafede þæt hye any þing spræcen. for þan he hyo wisten þæt he crist wæs.
Ða ge-wordenen daige se hælend ut-gangende ferde on westene stowe. & þa manega hine sohten. & hyo comen to hym. & be-hæfden hine; þæt he heom fram ne wite.
Ða sægde he heom. Soðlice me ge-þafened oþren ceastren godes riche bodian. for þan to þan ich eom asend
& he wæs bodiende on galilea ge-samnunge.
Soðlice wæs ge-worðen þa þa manege him to comen þæt hyo godes word ge-hyrden. he stod wið þane mere genesareth.
& he ge-seah twa scipe standende wið þanne mere. Ða fixeres eoden & wexon heore nett.
He þa astigende on an scyp; þæt wæs symones. bed hine þæt he hit lithwan fram lande tuugen. & on þam scype sittende he lærde þa manega.
Ða he spræcen ge-swac he cwæð to symone. Teoh hit on deopan & læteð eowre nett on þanne fisc-wær.
Ða cwæd symon him andswerede. Ela be-bended (sic) ealle niht swikende we naht ne fengen. Soðlice on þinum worde ich min nett ut-læte.
& þa hyo þæt dydon. hyo be-tugen mycele maniga fixsca; & heore nett wæs to-broken.
& hyo becneden heore ge-feren; þe on oðren scypen wæren. þt hyo comen & heom felsten. Ða comen hyo & ge-felden baða þa scype swa þæt hyo neh wæren ge-sencten.
Þa petrus þæt ge-seah he feoll to þas hælendes cneowen; & cwæð. Drihten ge-wit fram me for þam ich em sinful man
& he wundrede. & ealle þa þe mid hym wæren on þam wære þare fixsca þe hyo ge-fengen.
Gelice Iacobum & Iohannem Zebedeis sunes. þa wæren symones ge-feran. Þa cwæð se hælend to symone. ne on-dræd þu þe. Heonen forð þu byst mënn feonde.
& hyo tugen hyre scyp to lande. & for-læten hyo & folgedon þam hælende.
Þa he wæs on anre ceastre þa wæs þær an hreofla. & þa he ge-seah þanne hælend þa astrahte he hine & bæd. & þus cwæð. Drihten gif þu wilt. þu miht me ge-clænsien.
Ænd he æt-hran hine his handa aþenede. & cwæð. Ic wille; syo þu ge-clænsed. Ænd sone se hreofla hym fram ferde.
& he bed him þt he hit nanen men ne saigde. ac ga & atewe þe þam sacerde. ænd bring for þinre claensinge swa moyses be-bead heom on ge-witnysse.
Witodlice þas þe mä seo spræc be him ferde & mycele menega comen þæt hyo ge-hyrdon & wurðen ge-hælede fram heora untrumnesse.
He þa ferde on westen & hine ge-bæd.
Þa wæs anen daige ge-worðen þæt he sæt & hyo lærde. & þa wæren þa farisei sittende & þare lage-lareow-wæs. þa comen of ælche castelle galilëë & Iudëë & ierusalem. & drihten magen wæs hyo to gehælene.
Ænd þa bæren men on anen bedde enne man; se wæs lame.
& hyo ne mihten hine in-bringen & aleggen be-foran hym; for þare maniga þe mid þam hælende wæs. Ða astigen hyo up on þanne rof. & þurh þa watelas hine mid þam bedde asende be-foran þam halende.
Ða he ge-seah heora ge-leafe. he cwæð. La man þe synd þine sinne for-gefene.
Ða agunnen þencen þa bokeres & farisei & cwæðen. hwæt is þes þe her sprecd woffunga. hwa maig senna for-gefen buton god ane.
Ða seo hælend ge-cneow heora ge-þances; he andsweriende cwæð to heom. Hwæt þence ge on eowre heorten
hwæðer is eþere to cweðene þe synt þine senne for-gefene; hwaðer to cweðene aris & ga.
þæt ge witen þæt mannes sune on eordan anweald hafð synne to for-gefena. Ænd he sægde þam lamen. þe ich segge aris; nym þin bed & ga on þin hus.
& he sone be-foren heom aras; & nam þæt he on læig & to his huse eode. & god wuldrede.
& hyo ealle wundredon & god mærsedon & wæren mid eige ge-fylde. & cwæðen soðes we to-daig wundre ge-seagen.
Þa æfter þan he ut-eode. & ge-seah publicanum þe wæs oðer name leuj ge-haten. æt cheap-scamele sittende. & he cwæð to hym felge me.
& he hym þa felgede. & ealle hys þing for-let.
Ænd leuj dyde him michele ge-beorscipe on his huse. & þær wæs mycele manege manfulra & oðre þe mid him sæton.
Þa murcneden þa farisei & þa bokeres. & cwæðen to his leorning-cnihten. hwi æte ge. & drinkeð mid manfullen & senfullen.
Ða andswerede se hælend & cwæð to heom. Ne be-þurfen læches þa þe hale synde. ac þa þe un-hæle hæbbeð.
Ne com ich rihtwise to clepian. ac synfulle on deadbote.
Ða cwæðen hyo to hym. hwi fæsted iohannes leorningcnihtes ge-lomlice & halsunge doð. & eal swa fariseen. & þine æteð & drinceð;
Þa cwæð he. cwedst þu magen þas bredgumen bearn fæsten. swa lange swa se bredgume mid heom ys.
Soðlice þa dages cumeð þanne se bredgume heom beoð aferred. þanne fæsted hyo on þan dagen.
Ða sæde he heom an bispell. Ne asende nan man scyp on neowan reafe. on eald reaf elles þæt neowe slyt. & se neowe scyp ne helpd þan ealden.
Ne nan man ne synt niwe win on ealde butta elles þæt neowa win breceð þa butta & þæt win beoð agoten & þa butta for-wurðed.
Ac neowe win is to asendenne on neowe butta þanne beoð þa butte ge-healdenne.
& ne drincð nan man eald win. & wille sona þæt neowe he cweð þæt ealde is betere.
Soðlice wæs ge-worðen on þam æfteren reste-daige; ærest þa ferde he þurh þa æceras hys leorning-cnihtes þa ear pluccoden. & mid heora handa gnidon & æten.
Ða cwæðen sume of þam sunder-halgen. hwi do ge þæt eow alyfd nis on reste-dagen.
Ða andswerede se hælend heom & cwæð. Ne redde ge hwæt dauid dyde þa him hingrede. & þa þe mid him wæron
hu he eode into godes huse & nam þa offrenge-hlafes & hyo æt. & þam sealde þe mid him wæren. þa næren alyfde to ætene buton sacerden. anen.
Ænd he saigde heom þæt drihten is mannes sune. eac swilce reste-daiges.
Soðlice on oðrum reste-daige wæs ge-worðen. þæt he on ge-samnunge eode. & lærde. & þær wæs sum man. & his swiðre hand wæs for-scrunken.
Ða gemden þa bokeras & pharisei hwaðer he on reste-daige helde þæt hyo hine wreidon.
Soðlice he wiste heore þances & he saide þam men þe þa forscrunkene hand hafde. aris & stand her amidden. Ða aras he & stod.
Ða cwæð se hælend to hem  . Ich acsie eow alyfð on reste-dagon wel don oððe yfele sawle hæle ge-don hwæder þe forspillan.
And heom eallon ge-sceawedon mid eorre he saigde þam men. Aþene þine hand; & he aþenede & hys hand wæs ednywod.
Ða wurðen hyo mid unwisdome ge-fyllede & spræcen be-twux heom hwæt hyo þam hælende dydon.
Soðlice on þam dagen he ferde on ænne munt. hine ge-byddan. & wæs þær wakiende on godes ge-bede.
Ænd þa þa hit daig wæs he cleopede his leorning-cnihtes & ge-cheas twelf of heom. & þa he nemnede apostles.
Simonem þanne he nemnede petrus. & his broðer andreas. Iacobum. & Iohannem. philippum & bartholomeum.
Thomam & Matheum. Iacobum alphei & symonem. se ys ge-nemned zelotes
Iudam Iacocobi (sic). & Iudam scarioth. se wæs læwa.

And mid heom farenden he stod on feldlicere stowe & micel werd hys leorning-cnihte & mycele manega fram alre iudea. & fram ierusalem & ofer muðan & sæ. ge-mare tyry & sydonis. þa comen þæt hyo hyne ge-hyrdon & wæren of heora adlen ge-hælde.
& þa þe waren of un-clænen gaste ge-drehte wæren ge-hælede.
Ænd seo manegeo sohte hine to æt-hrinnenne. for þam þe mægen of hym eode. & he ealle ge-hælde.
Ða cwæð se hælend beo-seonde to hys leorning-cnihton. Eadige synde ge þearfen on gaste. for þan þe godes rïce is eower.
Eadige synde ge þe hingrieð nu. for þam ge beoð ge-fyllede. Eadige synde ge þe nu wepad; for þam ge hlyhað.
Eadige beo ge þanne eow men hatiað & ehtað. & on-huscað. & awurped eowre namen swa swa yfel for mannes sune.
Ge-blissiad & ge-fageniad on þam dagen; nu eower mede is mycel on heofene. Soðlice æfter þisen þingen hyra faderes dydon þam witegan.
Þeah-hwæðere wa eow witegan. for þan þe ge eowwerne frofer hæbbeð.
Wa eow þe ge-fylde sinde; for þan þe ge hingriað. Wa eow þe nu hlehgad for þan þe ge heofað & wepeð.
Wa eow þanne eow ealle men bletsiað æfter þisen þingen heora fæderes dyden þam witegen.
Ac ic eow segge for þam þe ge hyrad. Lufiað eowre feond doð þam tæle þe eow hatedon.
Bletsieð þa þe eow weregieð. Ge-biððed for þam þe eow on-huscieð.
& þam þe þe slehð on þam wange. wend oðer agen. & þam þe þin reaf nymð ne for-beod him na þine tunecan.
Syle ælcen þe þe bidde. & se þe nymd þa þing þe þine synde ne munega þu hyra.
& swa eow willeð þt eow men do; doð hem ge-lice.
& hwilc þanc is eow gyf ge lufieð þa þe eow lufieð. Soðlice senfulle lufieð; þa þe hy lufieð.
And gif ge wel doð þan þe eow wel doð; hwilc þanc is eow. Witodlice þæt doð sinfulle.
& gyf ge leaneð þam þe ge eft on-foð; hwilc þanc is eow. Soðlice sinfulle sinfulle leaneð. þæt hyo gelice on-fon.

Þeah-hwæðere lufiað eowre feond. & heom wel doð. & leane sylled nan þing þanum (sic) eft ge-hihtende. & eower mede beod mycel on heofene. & ge beoð þas hegesten bearn. for þam þe he ys god ofer unþanc-fulle & ofer yfele.
Eornestlice beoð mildheorte swa eower fader is mildheort.
Nelle ge demen. & ge ne beoð demede. Nelle ge nyðerien. & ge ne beoð ge-nyðereð. For-gyfeð; ænd eow beoð for-gefen.
Selleð & eow beoð ge-seald. göd ge-met & full & ge-heapod. & ofer-flowende hyo sylled on eowrne bearm. Þam sylfen ge-mette þe ge meteð; eow beoð ge-metan.
Ða sæde he heom sum by-spell. Segst þu maig se blinde þane blinde læden. hu ne fealled hyo begen on þanne pet.
Nis se leorning-cniht ofer þanne lareow. ælc byð fulfremed gyf he is swilc hys lareow.
hwi ge-syhst þu þa eigle on þines broðer eagen. & ne syhst þænne beam on þynen eagen.

Ænd hu myht þu seggen þinen breðer. broðer læt þæt ïc ateo þa eigle of þinen eagen. & ðu self ne ge-syhst þanne beam on þinen eagenen eagen. Eala licetere teoh ærest þanne beam of þinen eage. & þanne þu ge-syhst þæt þu ateo þa eigle of þines broðor eage.
Nïs god treow þæt yfelne wæstm deð. & nis yfel treow godne wæstm doende.
Ælc treow is be hys wæstme on-cnawen. Ne hyo of þornen fic-æppel ne gaderieð. ne winberian of gorste ne nymeð.
göd man of goden goldhorde; hys heorte god forð-brincð. & yfele men of yfele goldhorde yfel forð-bringeð. Soðlice se muð specð swa swa sye heorte þencð.
Hwy clepie ge me drihten drihten & ne doð þæt ic eow segge.
Ælc þare þe to me kymð. & mine spræce ge-hyrð & þa deð. ïch hym ätewie hwam he ge-lic ys.

He ys gelïc tymbriende men hys hus se dealf deopne & his grundwall ofer þanne stan asette. Soðlice ge-worðene flode hit fleow in-to þam huse. & hit ne mihte þt hus astyrian hit wæs ofer þanne stan ge-trymed.
Se ðe ge-hyrð & ne deð; he is ge-lich þam tymbrienden men his hus ofer þa eorðen buton grundwalle. & þt flod in-fleow & rædlice hit afeol & warð mycel ryre þas huses.
Soðlice þa he ealle his word gefylde on þas folces hlyste. he eode in-to capharnaum.
Ða wæs sum hundred-mannes þeowa untrum se wæs swentendlic (sic). se wæs him dyere.
Ænd þa he ge-hyrde be þam hælende. he sende to him iudea aldres. & bed þæt he come & his þeow ge-hælde.
Ða hyo to þam hælende coman. hyo bæden hine geornlice & þus cwæðen. He is wurðe þæt þu him telie.
Witodlice he lufeð ure þeode. & he us ure samnunge ge-tymbrede.
Ða ferde se hælend mid heom. & þa he wæs unfeor þam huse se hundredes ealdor sende his frend to him and cwæð. Drihten nelle þu beon ge-dreaht. ne eom ïch wurðe þæt þu ga under minne þechene;
for þan ïch ne tealde me sylfne swa wurð þæt ich to þe come. Ac cweð þin word and mïn cniht beoð ge-hæled.
Ic eom an man under anwealde ge-sett; cæmpen under me hæbbende. & ïch segge þissen ga; & he gæð. & ïch segge þissen cum; þonne cymð he. & ïch segge mine þeowe þis do; & he hit deð.
Ða wundrede se hælend þam ge-hyrden. & cwæð. to þare manigeo be-wend. Soðlice ic segge eow ne funde ich on israel swa mychele ge-leafen.
& þa þa ham comen þe asende wæren hyo ge-metten halne þanne þe ær utrum wæs.
Þa wæs syððen ge-worðen he ferde on þa ceastre þe ys ge-nemned naym; & mid hym ferden his leorning-cnyhtes. & mycel manigeo.
Þa he ge-nehlahte þare ceastre gate þa wæs þær an dead man ge-boren ane wudewon sune. þe nænne oðerne næfde. & syo wudewe wæs þær. & mycel menigeo þare burh-wære mïd hire.
Ða se hælend hyo ge-seah. Ða wæs he mïd mildheortnysse ofer hyo ge-felled. & cwæð to hire. ne wep þu na.
Þa ge-nehleahte he & þa cheste ætran. þa æt-stoden þa þe hine beren. Ða cwæð se hælend. Eala geonge þe is (sic) segge aris.
Þa aras se þe dead wæs. & ongan spræcen. þa agef he hine his moder.
Þa ofer-eode eyge hyo ealle. & hyo god mersodon & cwæðen. þt mare witega on us aras. & þæt god his folce ge-neosode.
Ða ferde þeos spræce be him on eallen iudea & embe eall þæt rice.
Ða cyddan iohannes leorning-cnihtes him be eallen þisen þingen.
Ða cleopede iohannes twegen of his leorning-cnihten to hym. & sende to þam halende & þus cwæð. Ert þu þe to cumene ert; hweðer þe we oðres sculon on-bidon.
Ða hyo to him comen þus hyo cwæðen. Iohannes se fulluhtere us sende to þe & þus cwæð. Ert þu þe to cumene ert. þe we sculon oðres on-bidan.
Soðlice on þare tide he ge-hælde manege of adlen. ge of witen. & of yfele gasten. & manegen blinden he ge-sihþe for-gef.
þa cwæð se hælend. Fareð end kydað Iohanne þa þing þe ge ge-seagen & ge-hyrden. þt blinde ge-seoð. & healte gað. hrefle synde ge-helde. deafe ge-hereð. deade ariseð. þærfen bodiað.
& eadige beoð swa hwilc swa ne beoð on me ge-untreowsod.
And þa þa iohannes arend-dracan ferdon; þa cwæð se hælend to þam folce be Iohanne. hwi ferde ge on westene ge-seon þt reod þe bieð mid winde astyred.
Ac hwi ferde ge. to ge-seonne þanne man mid hnescan reafen ge-scyrdne. Þa þe sende on deorwurðe reafe & on esten.
Ac hwi ferde ge þanne witegan ge-seon witodlice ich eow segge he ys mare þanne witega.
Þes is be þam þe awriten ïs. nu ïch asende minne ængel be-foran þine ansyene; se ge-gerewed þinne weig be-foran þe.
Soðlice ïch eow segge nis be-tweox wife bearnen nan mare witegen. þanne iohannes se fulluhtere. Se þe ys læsse on godes rice; se is his mare;
& eall folc his herende sunder-halgen god heredon & ge-fullode on Iohannes fulluhte.
Soðlice þa sunder-halgen & þa lage-gleawen for-hugedon þas hælendes ge-þoht on heom sylfen na fram þam hælende ge-fullode.
Hwan telle ic ge-lic þeosse cneorisse men. & hwam synde hi  ge-lice.
Hyo synde gelice cylden on strete sittende & sprecende be-tweox heom. & cwæðende. We sungen eow be harpen. & ge ne salteredon. we heofoden & ge ne weopen.
Soðlice Iohannes com se fulluhtere hlaf ne etende ne win drinkende. & ge cweðed. deofel-seocnysse he hafð.
Mannes sune com etende & drinkende. & ge cweðað þes man ys swelgende & win drinkende. manfulra & senfulre freond.
And wisdom ïs ge-rihtwised on eallen his bearnen.
Þa bæd sum hine of þam sunder-halgen þt he mid hym æte. Þa eode he in-to þas fariseiscen huse & ge-sæt.
And þa þæt wif þe wæs on þare ceastre synful þa hy on-cneow þæt he sæt on þas farisees huse. hyo brohte hire sealfe-box.
& stod wið-eften his fet. & on-gan mid hire tearen his fet þwean. & dreide mid hire heafdes fexe. & kyste hys fet. & mid sealfe smerede.
Ða se sunder-halge þe hine in-laðede þæt ge-seah; he cwæð on his ge-þance. Gif þes man witege wære. witodlice he wiste hwæt & hwilc þæt wif wære þe his æt-rind. þæt hyo synful ïs.
Ða cwæð se hælend him andsweriende. Simon ïch hæbbe þe to seggene sum þing. Ða  he. Lareow sege þanne.
Twegen gafel-gyldon wæren sumen lænende; & scolde fif hund panege se an. & se oðer fiftig.
Ða hyo næfden mid hwy hyo hit agulden. he hit heom bam for-gef. hwader lufede hine swiðre.
Ða andswerede symon ic wene. se þe he mare for-gef. Ða cwæð he rihte þu demdest.
Ða be-wende he hine to þam wife. & sægde symone. Ge-syhst þu þis wif; ïch eode in-to þinen huse. ne gefe þu me wæter to minen foten. Þeos mid hire tearen mine fet þweag. & mid hire locken dreide.
Cos þu me ne gefe. þeos seððe ïch ïnn eode ne ge-swac þæt hyo mine fet ne kyste.
Min heafed þu mid ele ne smeredest. þeos smerede mid sealfe mine fet.
For þam ïch segge þe; hyre synde manege synne for-gefene. for þan þe hio me swiðe lufede. læsse lufod þam þe læsse for-gyfen ïs.
Ða cwæð he to hire. ðe synde þine senne for-gefene.
Þa be-gunnen þa þe þær sæten be-twux heom cweðen. hwæt is þes þe manne synne for-gyfð.
Þa cwæð he to þan wife. þin geleafe þe dyde hal ga nu on sibbe.
Syððon wæs ge-worðen þæt he ferde þurh þa ceastren. & þa ceastle godes rice predikende & bodiende. & hyo twelf mide.
And sume wif þe wæren ge-helde of awweregeden gasten & untrumnyssen. sye magdalenisce Marie of þare seofan deofle ut-eoden.
& iohann chuzan wif herodes ge-refen; & susanna & manega oþre þe him of hyra spede þenedon.
Soðlice þa mycel manige com & of þa ceastren to hym efstum (sic); he saigde heom an bispel.
Sum man hys sæd seow. þa he þæt seow sum feoll wið þanne weig & warð for-treden. & heofene fugeles hit fræton.
And sum feoll ofer þanne stan & hit for-scranc for-þam-þe hyt wæten næfde.
& sum feol on þa þornas; & þa þornes hit for-þrysmeden.
And sum feoll on gode eorþan. & worhte hund-fealddne wæstme. Þa clypede he & cwæð. Ge-here se þe earen hæbbe.
þa axseden hine hys leorning-cnihtes hwæt þt bispel wære.
Ða cwæð he eow is ge-seald þt ge witen godes rices ge-ryne. & oðren on bi-spellen þaet hyo ge-seonde ne ge-seagen & ge-hyrende ne on-geoton.
Soðlice þis is þæt bispell. þæt sæd is godes word.
þa þe synd wið þanne weig. þæt synde þa þe ge-hyred. seoððen se deofel kymð and æt-briht þt word. of heora heortan þæt hio þurh þane ge-leafen hale ne ge-wurðað.
Þa þe sinde ofer þanne stan; þa þæt word mid ge-fean on-foð. & þa næbbed wertrumen for-þan-þe hyo hwilon ge-leafen and awakieð on þare costnunge timen.
Þæt sæð þt feoll on þa þornes þæt synde þa þe ge-hered. & of caren & of welen & of luston þys lifes synde for-þrysmede & nænne wæstme ne bringeð.
Þæt feoll on þa goden eorðan. þt synde þa þe on godere & on selestre heortan ge-herende þt word healdeð ænd wæstme on ge-þilde bringed.
Ne ofer-wercð nan man mid fæte his on-ælde leoht-fæt; oððe under beoð aset. ac ofer candel-stef asett. þæt þa ingangende þæt leoht ge-seon.
Soðlice nis nan þing swa dygele þæt ne seo ge-swutelod. ne be-hyðð; þæt ne syo cuð. & open.
Warniað hu ge ge-hyren; þam beod ge-seald ðe hæfeð. & swa hwilc þe næfeð þt he wene þt he hæbbe him beoð afirred.
Hys moder & his ge-broðre him to comen. & hio ne mihte hine for þare manige ge-neoh-sian.
Þa wæs him ge-cydeð. Ðin moder & þine ge-brodre standeð her ute willeð þe ge-seon.
Þa cwæd he to heom. min moder & mine ge-brodre synde þa þe ge-hireð & doð godes word.
Soðlice anen daige wæs ge-worðen þa þe he on scyp eode. & his leorning-cnihtes; þa cwæd he to heom. Vton seiglien ofer þisne mere. & hyo segledon þa.
þa þe hyo reowan þa slep he. Þa com windj east & hyo forteden.
Þa ge-nehlahten hyo him to & cwæðen hlaford we forwurðeð. Ða aras he & þreadde þane wind. & þas wæteres reðnysse. Ða ge-swac se wind & wærð mycel smoltnysse.
Þa cwæð se hælend hwær is eower ge-leafe. Þa andreddon hio & wundredon. end be-twuxe heom cwæðen. Wenst þu hwæt is þes. þæt he be-beot windon. & sæ; & hy him hersumieð.
Ða reowen hy to gerasenorum rice. þt is foren on-gean galileam.
Ða he to lande com; him agen arn sum man se hæfde deofel-seocnysse lange tide. & næs mid nanen reafe ge-scrid. & ne mihte on huse ge-wunian ac on byregenen.
Þa he ge-seah þanne hælend he astrehte hine to-foren him & cwæð. michelere stefne hremende. Hwæt is me & þe la hælend þas hehestan godes sune. Ic halsige þe þæt þu ne ðreage me.

Þa bed he þam unclænen gaste. þæt he of þam men ferde. Soðlice lange tide he hine grap & he wæs mid raketeagen ge-bunden & mid fot-copsen ge-healden. & to-borstenen benden he wæs fram deofle on westen ge-lædd.
Ða axoden se hælend hine hwæt is þin name. Ða cwæð he legio; þæt is on ure ge-þeode eored; for-þan-þe manege deofle on hine eodon.
Ða bæden hyo hine þæt he heom ne bude þt hy on grund ne be-scuton.
And þær wæs mycel heord swine on þam munte læsiendre. Ða bæden hio þæt he lefde heom on þam gan; þa lefde he heom.
Þa eoden hyo of þam menn on þa swin. þa ferde se heord michelen raese on þane mere. & warð þær adruncen.
Þa þa heorden þæt ge-seagen þa flugen hyo & kyddan on þa ceastre & on þa tunan.
Ða eoden hio ut þæt hyo ge-seagen þt þær ge-worðen wæs. Þa comen hyo to þam hælende þa funden hyo þanne man þe deofel of eode ge-scridne & halen mode æt his fote. & hyo adredden heom.
Ða kyddan heom þa þe ge-seagen hu he wæs hal ge-worden of þam heorde.
Ða bæd hine eall syo manege þas rice gerasenorum þt he fram heom ge-wite. for þam hyo micelen eige ge-hæfte wæren. Ða wende he on scype on-gen.
Ða bæð hine se man ðe se deofel of eode þæt he mid hym wunede. Þa for-let se hælend hine & cwæð to hym.
wend to þinen huse. & kyd hu mycel god þe ge-don hæfð. Þa ferde he in to eall þa ceastre & kydde hu mycel se hælend him ge-don hæfde.
Soðlice wæs ge-worðen þa se hælend agen com seo manege hine onfeng. ealle hyo on-bidan hys.
Ænd þa com an man þæs name wæs jairus; se wæs þare ge-samnunge ealdor. Þa feoll he to þæs hælendes foten. & bæd hine þæt he ferde to his huse;
for-þan he hæfde ane dohter neoh on twelf wintre & syo forð-ferde. Ða ge-byrede hit. þa he ferde of þam manegen he wæs of-þrungen.
Ða wæs sum wif of blodrine twelf gear. syo for-dælde on læces eall þæt hyo ahte. & ne mihte hire þeah of anygen beon ge-hæld.
Ða ge-nehlahte hyo wið-æften. & æt-ran hys reafes flned (sic). Ða æt-stod sone þas blodes rine.
Ða cwæð se hælend. hwæt ys se þe me ætran. þa hyo ealle æt-soken; þa cwæð petrus & þa þe mid hym wæren. eale hlaford þas manigeo þe þringað. & ge-swenced. & þu sægst hwa æt-ran me.
Þa cwæð he sum me æt-ran. ic wiste þæt maing me of eode.
Ða þæt wif ge-seah þæt hit him næs derne; hyo com forð. & astrehte hyo to his foten & ge-swutelede be-foren ealle folce. for hwilcen þingen hyo hine æt-hran. & hu hyo warð sone hall.
Ða cwæð he to hire. Dohter þin ge-leafe þe hal ge-dyde. ga nu on sibbe.
Him þa gyt sprecenden þa com sum man to þare ge-samnenge ealdre & cwæð to him; ne drece þu hine.
Ða se hælend þæt word ge-hyrde he andswerede þas mædenes fader. Ne on-dræð þu þe. ge-lef witodlice. & hyo beod hal.
Ænd þa he to þan huse com; ne let he nenne mid him in-gän buton petrum & Iohannem & Iacobum. & þas mædenes fæder & hire moder.
Ða weopen hyo ealle & heofodon hyo. Ða cwæð he ne wepe ge. soðlice nis þis mæden dead ac hyo slepð.
þa tælden hyo hine. & wiston þæt hyo deað wes.
Ða nam he hire hand & cwæð. Mæden þe ic segge aris.
Ða ge-hwarp hire gast agen & hyo sona aras. & he het hire syllan æten.
Ða wundreden hire mages. þa bed he þan þæt hyo hit nanen menn ne sægdon. þæt þær ge-don wæs.
Þa cleopede he to-gædere his twelf apostles & sealde heom mihte. & anweald ofer ealle deofel-seocnysse. & þæt adle hyo ge-healden.
& he senð hy to bodienne godes rice. & un-trume gehælen.
Ða cwæð he to heom. ne nyme ge nan þing on weige. ne gyrde ne cod ne hlaf ne feoh ne ge næbben twa tunecan.
& on swa hwilce huse swa ge in gad wunied þær oððe ge ut-gan.
& swa hwilce swa eow ne on-fod þanne ge of þare ceastre gad asacað eowre fota dust ofer hyo on witnysse.
Ða ferden hyo þurh þa burga bodiende. & æghwær hælende.
Ða ge-herde herodes se ferðen dæles rice ealle þa þing þe be him wæren ge-worðene. Ða tweonede him for-þan þe sume sægdon þt iohannes of deaðe aras
sume sædon þæt helias atewde. sume þæt an eald witega aras.
Ða cwæð herodes. iohannem ich be-heafdede hwæt is þes. be hwam ic þellic ge-hire. Ða smægde he þæt he hine geseage.
Ða cyððan hym þa apostles swa hwæt swa hyo dyden. Þa nam he hyo & ferde on-sunder on weste stowe syo is bethsaida.
Ða þa manige þæt wisten þa felgeden hyo hym; þa onfeng he hyo & spræc to heom be godes rice. & þa he ge-hælde þa læcnunge be-þorten.

Þa ge-wat se daig forð. & hyo twelfe neh-lacte hym. & sæden to hym. Læt þas manige þæt hyo faran on þas castelles. & on þas tunas þe her abuton sinde. & heom mete finden. for-þam we sinde her on westene stowe.
þa cwæð he to heom. sylle ge heom etan. Ða cwæðen hyo we næbbeð buten fif hlafes. & twegen fixsas. buton we gan & us mete beggen & eallen þissen werede.
þær wæren neh fif þusend were. þa cwæð he to hys leorning-cnihton. Ðoð þæt hyo sitten þurh ge-beorscypas fiftegum
& hyo swa dydon. & hyo ealle sæten.
Ða nam he þa fif hlafes. & þa twegen fixas. & on þanne heofen be-seah & bletsode hyo & bræc. & dælde his leorning-cnihten. þæt hyo asetten hyo be-foran þam manigeo.
Ða æten hyo ealle. & wurðen ge-fylde. & man nam þa ge-brute þe þær wære & fylde twelf kypan fulle.
Ða wæs ge-worðen þa se hælend wæs ane hine ge-biddende. his leorning-cnihtes wæren mid him. Ða axsode he hyo. hwæt sægð þis folc þæt ich syo.
Ða andsweredon hyo & cwæðen. Iohannes baptistam. sume Heliam. sume þæt sum witege of þam ealden aras.
Ða saigde he heom. hwæt segge ge þæt ich syo. Þa andswerede petrus. þu ert crist godes sune.
þa þreadde he hyo & bæd. þæt hyo hit nanen men ne saigden.
for-þam-þe hit ge-byred þæt mannes sune fele þinge þolie. & beo aworpen fram ealdren mannen. & fram boker. & beon of-slagen. & ðridden daige arisan.
Þa cwæð he to eallen. Gyf hwa wile æfter me cuman; æt-sake hine sylfne. & nime his cwelminge & me folgie.
Se þe wile his sawle hæle ge-don; se hyo for-spilð. Witodlice se þe his sawle for me for-spilð. he hyo ge-hæleð.
hwæt fremed anig men þeah he alne midden-eard on ehte be-geote. & hine sylfne for-spille. and his for-wurd werche.
Se þe me & mine spæce for-sihð. þanne mannes sune for-sihð þane He kemð on his magen-þrimnesse & his fader & halgra ængle.
Ic segge eow soðlice he (sic) sende sume standende þe deade ne wurðað ær hyo godes rice ge-seon.
Ða wæs ge-worðen æfter þam worden neoh ehte dagas. þæt he nam petrum. & Iohannem. & Iacobum. & eode on enne munt. þæt he hine ge-bæde.
Ða he hine ge-bæd þa wæs his ansiene ge-worðen oðres hiowes. & his reaf hwit scynende.
Ða spæken twegen weres wið hine. moyses & helias.
ge-sogene on magen-þrimnesse. & sæden his witendnysse þe he to ge-fellende wæs on ierusalem.
Petrus & þa þe mid him wæren wurðen mid slape ge-hefegede. And þa hyo on-wakeden; hyo ge-seagen his maing-þrim. & twegen weres þe mid hym stoden.
And hyo hym fram eoden; petrus cwæð to him. Eala be-beodend; god is þæt we her beon. & uten wercan þreo eardung-stowen ane þe. & ane moysese. & ane helie. & he nyste hwæt he cwæð.
Þa he þis spæc; þa warð ge-nip & ofer-scadede hyo. & hyo on-drædden him gangende on þæt ge-nip.
Ða com stefn of þam ge-nip & cwæð. Þes is min leofa sune ge-hered hine.
Ða seo stefen wæs ge-hyrd. þa wæs se hælend ge-met äne; & hyo swegedon. & ne sæden nanen men on þam daige nan þing. þas þe hyo ge-sægen.
Oðren daige him of þan munte farende hym agen arn mycel manegeo.
þa cleopede an wer of þare manigeo & cwæð. Lareow ic hælsige þe ge-seoh minne sune. for-þan he ys min anliche sune.
& nu se un-clæne gast hine æt-rind; & he færlice hrimd. & for-nymd hine. & fæmð. & hine tyrð. & slit;
& ic bæd þine leorning-cnihtes þæt hyo hine ut adrifen & hyo ne mihton.
Ða cwæð se hælend him to andswere. Eala un-ge-leafulle & þwore cneores. Swa lange swa ic beo mid eow. & eow þolie. læd hider þinne sune.
And he þa lædde hine him to; se deofol hine nam & for-dyde. Ða nædde se hælend þanne unclæne gast ut. & ge-hælde þanne cnapan. & agef hine his fæder.
Ða wundredon hyo ealle be godes mærðe. & eallen wundrenden be þam þingen; þe ge-wurðen ware. He cwæd to his leorning-cnihten.
Asetteð þas spræce on eowren heorten; hit is to-ward þæt mannes sune syo ge-seald on mannes handen.
Þa þohten hyo þis word. & hit wæs be-wrigen be-foren heom þæt hyo hit ne on-geaton. & hyo ne dorsten hine be þam worde ahsian.
Soðlice þæt þanc eode on hyo hwilc heora yldest wære.
Þa se hælend þis ge-hyrde he ge-seah here heortan ge-þances he ge-sette þanne cnapen wið hine;
& cwæð to heom. Se þe þisne cnape on minen naman on-fehð; he on-fehð me. & se þe on-fehð me; he on-fehð þane þe me sente. Witodlice se þe is læst be-tweox eow ealle; se is mara.
Þa andswerede Iohannes. be-beodend we ge-seage sumne on þinen naman deofel-seocnysse ut-drifende. & we hine for-buden; for-þam he mid üs ne fylgieð.
Ða cwæð he ne for-beode ge. Se þe nis on-gean eow se is forð mid eow.
Soðlice wæs ge-worðen þa hys anfengen dages wæren ge-worðene ge-fellede; he ge-tremede his ansiene þt he ferde to ierusalem.
Þa sente he boden be-foren his ansiene. þa eoden hyo on þa cestre Samaritanorum þæt hyo him ge-gearewedon.
& hyo ne on-fengen hine for-þam þe he wolde faran to ierusalem.
Ða his leorning-cnihtes þæt ge-herden. Iacobus. & Iohannes. þa cwæðen hyo. Drihten wilt þu þt we seggen þæt fer cume of heofene & for-nyme hyo.
& he be-wente hine & hyo þreatede.
& hyo ferde on oðerne castel.
Þa hyo ferden on wëi sume him to cwæðe. Ic felgie þe swa hwider swa þu ferst.
Ða cwæð se hælend. foxas hæbbeð hole. & heofene fugeles nystas. soðlice mannes sune næfð hwær he hys heafed ahylde.
Ða cwæð he to oðren felgieð me. Ða cwæð he drihten alyf me ærest berien minne fader.
Þa cwæð se hælend. læt þa deade berigen heora deaden. ga þu & bode godes rice.
Ða cwæð se oðer. ic felgie þe drihten. æc læt me arest hit kyðan þam þe æt ham synden.
Ða cwæð se hælend hyem to. nan man þe his hand asett on his slulh (sic) & on his bæch be-sihð. nis and-fenge godes rice.
After þan se hælend ge-mearcude oðre twa and hund-seofentig. & sente hyo twam & twam beforan his ansiene on ælce ceastre & stowe þe he to cumenne wæs.
& cwæð to heom her is micel rip & feawe wirhtan byddeð þas ripes hlaford þt he sende wirhten to his ripe.
Fared nu; nu ich eow sende swa swa lamb be-twux wulfes.
Ne bere ge sech. ne cod. ne ne scy (sic). ne nenne man be weige ne greteð.
On swa hwilce huse swa ge in-gad; cweðed arest. sib syo þisse hiwrædene.
And gyf þær beoð sibbe bearn. reste þær eower sibbe. Gif hit elles syo. & hyo syo to eow ge-cerred;
wunieð on þam ylcan huse & etad & drinkeð þa þing þe hyo hæbbeð on þam ilken huse. Sodlice se werchte is his mede wurðe. Ne fare ge fram huse to huse.
ac on swa hwilce ceastre ge in-gað & hyo eow on-foð. æteð þæt eow æt-foren aset is.
& ge-hæleð þa utrumen þe on þam huse sende. & seggað heom; godes rice to eow geneohlaeceð.
on swa hwilce ceastre swa ge ingað; & hyo ne on-foð eow; gað on heore stræte & cwedeð.
Ðæt dust þæt of eowre ceastre on uren foten clefede. we dreigeð on eow. witeð þeah þt godes rice neohlæceð.
Ich eow segge þæt sodome-wæren on þam dagen beoð for-geofendlicere þanne þare ceastre ge-ware.
Wa þe corozaim wa þe bethsaida. for-þam gyf on tire & on sidone ge-worðene wæren þa manege þe on eow ge-done synde. ge-fern hyo on heren. & on escan reowsunge dydon.
Þeah-hwæðere tyre & sydone on þam daige beoð for-geofendlicere þanne eow.
Ænd þu capharnaum oð heofen up-ahafen; þu beost oð helle be-senceð.
Me ge-hyrð se þe eow ge-herð. & me ofer-hugeð; se þe eow ofer-hugeð. se þe me ofer-hugeð; he ofer-hugeð þane þe me sente.
þa ge-cyrde þa twa & hund-sefentig mid ge-fean & cwæðen. Drihten deofel-seocnysse us synden on þinen namen under-þeode.
Þa saide he heom. ic ge-seah satana swa swa legeræsc of heofene fallende.
& nu ich sealde eow anweald to tredenne ofer næddren & snaken & ofer ælc feondes mægen & nan þing eow ne dereð.
Ðah-hwæðere ne blissie ge on þam þe eow sende gastes under-þedde. Ge-blissieð þæt eower nämen synden on heofene a writene.

On þare tide he on halgen gaste blissede & cwæð. Ich andette þe fæder. drihten heofenes & eorðan. for-þan-þe þu þas þing wisen & gleawen be-heddest. & litlengen un-awruge. for-þam hit be-foran þe swa gelicode.
Ealle þing me synde fram mine fader ge-sealde. & namman nat hwilc is se sune buton se fæder. ne hwilc sye se fæder buton se sune. & se þe se sune hit un-awreon wile.
Þa cwæð he to his leorning-cnihton be-wend. Eadig synð þa eagen þe ge-seoð þa þing þe ge ge-seoð.
Soðlice ich eow segge þæt manige witegan & kynges wolden ge-seon þæt þæt ge ge-seoð. & hi hit ne ge-seagen. & wolden ge-heren þæt ge ge-hereð & hi hit ne ge-herdon.
Ða aras sum ægleow man & fandede his & cwæð. Lareow hwæt do ic þæt ich eche lif hæbbe.
Ða cwæð he to him. hwæt is ge-writen on þare lage. hu ræstdst (sic) þu.
Ða andswerede he. Lufe drihten þinne god. on ealre þinre heorte. & on alre þinre sawle. & on eallen þinen mihte. & of eallen þinen magene. & þine nehstan swa swa þe sylfne.
Ða cwæð he. rihte þu andsweredest. do þæt. þanne lefest þu.
Ða cwæð he to þam hælende. & wolde hine selfne rihtwisian. And hwilc is min nehsta.
Ða cwæð se hælend hine up be-seonde. Sum man ferde fram ierusalem to ierico. & be-com on þam scaðan. þa hine be-reafeden. & tintregedon hine & for-læten hine samcweocne.
Þa ge-byrede hit. þæt sum sacerde ferde on þan ylken weige. & þa he þæt ge-seah he hine for-beah.
& eall swa se diacone. þa he wæs wið þa stowe. & þæt ge-seah he hine eac for-beah.
Ða ferde sum samaritanisc man wið hine. þa he hine ge-seah. þa warð he mid mild-heortnysse ofer hine astyred.
Ða ge-nehlahte he & wrad his wunden. & þron geat ele & win. & hine on his neten sette. & ge-lædde on his læche-hus & hine læcnede.
& brohte oðren daige twegen paneges & sealde þam læce & þus cwæð. Begeam his. & swa hwæt swa þu mare to ge-dest; þanne ich cume ich hit for-gelde þe.
hwilc þare þreora þincd þe þæt syo þæs mæg þe on þa scaðan be-feoll.
Ða cwæð he. se þe him mildheortnysse on dæde. Ða cwæð se hælend; ga & do eal-swa.
Soðlice hit wæs ge-worden þa hyo ferden se hælend eode on sum castel. & sum wif on name martha on-feng hine on hire huse.
& þare swuster wæs Marie seo eac sæt wið þas hælendes fet. & his word ge-hyrde.
Soðlice martha geornlice him þenode. Ða stod hyo & cwæð. drihten nis þe nan care þæt min swuster læt me anlepige þenian. sege hire þæt hyo felste me.
Ða cwæð se hælend; martha martha geornfull þu ert & emb fele þinge ge-drefed.
Ge-wislice an þing is neod-be-hefe; marie ge-cheas þanne sælesten dael se hire ne beoð afirred.
Soðlice wæs ge-worðen þa he wæs on summer stowe hine be-biddende. þa þa he ge-swac. him to cwæð an his leorning-cnihten. Drihten lær us. us to ge-biddan. swa iohannes his leorning-cnihtes lærde.
þa cwæð he to heom. cweðed þus þanne ge eow ge-biddað. Ure fæder þu þe on heofene eart syo þin name ge-haleged. to-cume þin rice. ge-worðe þin wille on heofene & on eorðe.
syle us to-daig urne daig-hwamlicne hlaf.
& for-gyf us ure geltes swa we for-gyfað ælcen þare þe wið us agylteð. & ne læd þu us on costnunge. ac alys us fram yfele.
Ða cwæð he to heom. Hwilc eowre hafed sumne freond & gæð to middre nihte to him. & cwæð to hym. La freond læn me þreo hlafes.
for þan min freond com of weige to me. & ic næbbe hwæt ic him to-foran legge.
Ænd he him þanne þus andswerige. ne beo þu me gram nu min dure is be-cosen. & mine cnihtes synde on reste mid me ne maig ich arisan nu & sillen ðe.
Gyf he þanne þurh-wuned cnokigende; ic eow segge gyf he arist & him sylleð; þanne for þan þe he his freond is. þeah-hwæðere for hys on-rope he arist & sylð him his neode.
And ich eow segge byddað. & eow beoð seald. secheð & ge findað. cnokieð & eow beoð un-tynd.
Ælc þare þe bitt on-fehð. & se þe secð he fint. & cnokiende byð un-tyned.
hwilc eower bit his fader hlafes. segest þu seld he him stan. oððe gyf he bit fissces sylð he him næddren for fissces.
oððe gyf he hym bytt aig. segst þu ræcd he him scorpionem þæt is an werm-kyn.
Witodlice gyf ge þanne þe synt yfele cunnan syllan gode sylene eowren bearnen; swa micele ma eower fader of heofene sylð godne gast þam þe hine biddað.
Þa wæs se hælende ut-adrifende sume deofel-seocnysse. & seo wæs dumb. And þa he ut-adraf þa deofel-seocnisse. þa spræc se dumbe. & þa manega wundreden.
Sume cwæðen on beelzebub deofle ealdre he ut-adraf þa deofel-seocnysse.
And sume his fandedon & geornden of heofene tacnys of him.
Ða he ge-seah heora þances he cwæð. Ælc rice on hit sylf to-dæled byð to-worpen. & þæt hus ofer þæt hus fald.
Gif satanas is to-daeled on hine sylfne hu stent his rice for-ðan-þe ge seggeð þæt ich on beelzebub deofel-seocnysse ut-adrife.
Gyf ich on beelzebub deofle ut-adrife. on hwam ut-adrifeð eowre bearn. for-ðan hyo beoð eowre deman.
Ge-wislice gyf ic on godes fingre deofle ut-adrife; ealle godes rice on eow be-kymð.
Þanne se strange ge-wæpned his cæfertun ge-healt. þonne beoð on sibbe þa þing þe he ahð.
Gyf þanne strengre ofer hine cymð. & hine ofer-swið; ealle his wæpne þe he on truwede he hym afyrð. & to-dælð his here-reaf.
Se þe nis mid me. he is on-gen me. And se ne gadered mid me; se hit to-stret.
Þanne se un-clæne gast gæð of þam men; he gæð þurh un-wæterie stowe reste secende. & nane ne ge-mett. þanne cweð he. Ic wende æft to minen huse þe ich of eode.
& þanne he kymð he hit ge-mett emtig mid besme afermed.
þanne gæð he & nymð seofan oðre gastes wirsan þanne he. & in-gæð & þær eardieð. þanne synt þas mannes ændes werse þanne þam earren.
Soðlice wæs ge-worðen þa he þis saigde; sum wif him to cwæð. Eadig is se innoð þe þe bær. & þa breost þe þu suke.
Þa cwæð he. Eadige sinde þa þe godes word ge-hereð & þæt ge-healdeð.
Þa hyra manega to-gadere coman he cwæð to heom. Þeos cneoris is manful cneoris; he secd taken & hire ne beoð nan ge-seald buton Ionas taken.
Swa swa iona wæs taken Niniueten swa beoð mannes sune taken þise cneorisse.
Sud-dale cwen arist on dome mid þise cneorisse mannen & ge-nyðereð hyo for-ðan hyo com of eorðan endum to ge-heren Salomones wisdom. Ænd efne þes is mare þanne salomon.
Niniuetisce men arised on dome mid þisse cneornisse. & ge-ne-ðeriað hyo. forþan þe hyo deadbote dyden. æt Ionan bodegunge. & þes is mare þanne jona.
Ne on-ælð nan man his leoht-fett & sett on diglen. ne under bedene. ac ofer candel-stef. þæt þe ingað leoht ge-seon.
Þin eage is þines lichames leoht-fæt. Gif þin eage beoð hluttor; þanne beoð eall þin lichame briht. Gif hit beoð deorc; eall þin lichame beoð þeostre.
Warne þæt þt leoht þe þe on is; ne syo þeostra.
Gif þin lichame eall beoð breoht; & næfd nænne dæl þeostre; þanne beoð he eall breoht. & þe on-liht swa þæt leoht-fæt þas lægræsces.
Ða bæd hine sum fariseisc man þæt he æte mid him. & he in-eode & sætt.
Ða on-gan se fariseisce on him smeagen & cwæðan. Hwi he ge-þwogen nære ær his ge-reorde.
Ða cwæð drihten to him. nu ge farisei þæt ute is calices & disces ge-clænsieð þt eow innan is. þæt is ful reaflake & un-rihtwisnysse.
La desige hu ne worhten (sic) þt þt inne is. se þe worhte þæt ute is.
þeah-hwaðere þæt to lafe is sellað ælmessan þanne beoð eow ealle þing clæne.
Ac wa eow fariseum ge þe teoðiað mintan & rudan & ælce wirte. & ge for-bugeð dom & godes lufe. Þas þing eow ge-berede to donne. & þa þing ne for-læten.
Wa eow fariseen ge þe lufieð þa formen heahsetlen on ge-samnungen & gretinge on stræten.
Wa eow for-þan-þe ge sende swilce þa byrigenna þe man innan ne sceawed. & þa men nyten þe heom on ufen gad.
Ða andswerede him sum lage-gleaw. lareow teonan þu wercst us mid þisse sage.
Ða cwæð he Wa eow lagewisen forþan ge semeð menn mid þam byrdenen þe hyo aberen ne mugen. & ge ne æthrinað þa seames mid eowren anen fingren.
Wa eow þe timbrieð witegena byrigena; eowre faderes hyo of-slogen
eallunge. ge kyðed & ge þafieð eowre fader weorces. for-þam hyo slogen hyo. & ge timbrieð heore berigena.
For-þam cweð godes wisdom. Ic sende to heom witegen & þa apostles; & hyo of-slæð hyo & æhtað
þæt ealra witegene blod syo ge-soht; þe wæs agoten of midden-eardes fruman; fram þisse cneorisse
fram abeles blode oð zacharias blod. se for-warð be-tweox þam altare & þam temple. Ic eow segge swa beoð ge-soht fram þisse cneornysse.
Wa eow lage-gleawe for-þam-þe ge ætbruden þas inge-heades ceyge ge in ne ge-heodden. & ge for-budon þa þe in-eoden.
Þa he heom þis to cwæð. þa ongunnen þa farisej & þa lage-wisan hefilice him agën standen & his muð dettan.
& ymbe hine syrwan; sechende sum þing of his muðe þæt hyo hine wreidon
micelen wereden hym embe-standende. þæt hyo hine træden. Ða cwæð he to his leorning-cnihten warnieð eow wið farisea lare þæt is licetung.
Soðlice nis nan þing ofer-heled; þe ne beoð un-heled. ne be-hed; þe ne sye ge-wyten.
For-þan-þe þæt ge seggeð on þeostren beoð on leohte saigde. & þæt ge on earen spræcon on bedd-cofum beoð on rofen boded.
Ich segge eow minen freonden ne beo ge brygede fram þam þe þanne lichamen of-sleað. & næbbeð syððan. hwæt hyo ma don.
Ic eow atewige hwane ge on-dræden. adredeð þane þe anweald hæfð. seððan he of-slehð; on hellen asenden; þus ich eow segge; adredeð þane.
ne be-cypað hyo fif sparewen to halpenige. & an nis of þam ofer-gyten be-fore gode.
ac ealle eowres heafdes loccas sende ge-tealde. Ne on-dræde ge eow ge sende beteren þan manegen sparewen.
Soðlice ic eow segge swa hwilc swa me andeat be-foren mannen. þanne mannes sune andeat be-foren godes ængles.
Se þe me wið-secð be-foren mannen. se beoð wið-saken be-foran godes ænglen.
& ælc þe saigð ani word agen mannes sune. þam beoð for-gefen. Þam þe wiðer-sakeð on-gen halgen gast. ne beoð þam for-gyfen.
Þanne hyo lædeð eow on ge-samnunge. & to dugeðe ealdren. & to anwealden ne beo ge ymbe-þencende hu oððe hwæt ge spæcen oððe andswerien.
halig gast eow lærð on þare tide þthþing þe eow spæcan ge-byreð.
þa cwæð sum of þam manigeo. Lareow sege mine breðer þæt he dæle unker ehte wið me.
Ða cwæð he la man hwa sette me deman; oððe dælend ofer hine (sic)
Þa cwæð he. gymeð & warnieð wið ælce gitsunge. for-þan-þe nis nanes mannes lyf on gytsunge of þam þe he ah.
Ða sæde he heom sum bispel. Sumes weliges mannes acer brohte forð gode wæstmes.
þa þohte he on him sylfen & cwæð. hwæt do ic for-þan ich næbbe hwider ich mine wæstmes gaderie.
Ða cwæð he þus ich do. ic to-werpe mine berne. & ich werche hyo mare & ic gaderie þider eall þæt me wexen is. & mine god.
& ich segge minre sawle. eale sawel þu hafst mycele god. Asette to manegen gearen. ge-rest þe. æt & drinc & ge-wista.
Ða cwæð god to hym. La desige on þisse nihte hyo fecceð þine sawle fram þe. hwæs beoð þa þing. þe þu gærewedest.
Swa is se þe him sylfen strenþeð & nis welig mid gode.
Þa cwæð he to his leorning-cnihten. for-þan ich eow segge. ne beo ge ymbe-hedige eowre sawle hwæt ge etan. ne owren lichaman hwæt ge scrydan.
Seo sawle is mare þanne se lichame. & se lichame mare þanne þæt reaf.
Be-sceawiað þa refnes þæt hyo ne sawað ne ne ripað. næbbað hyo heddern ne bern. ac god hyo fet þas þe ma. ge synde heore selre.
hwilc eower mæg þencende echan ane elne to his anlichnysse.
gyf ge þæt læsse ne magen hwy synde ge be oðren þingen ymbe-hedige.
Scewieð þa lilien hu hyo wexeð. hyo ne swinceð ne ne spinneð. Soðlïce ic eow segge þæt Salomon on eallen his wuldre næs ge-scryd swa þis än.
Gif god scrytd þt hëy þe is to-daig on æcere & to-morgen for-scrincð. Swa mycele ma god scrit eow ge-hwædes ge-leafen.
Ænd nelle sechan hwæt ge etan oððe drincan. & ne beo ge up-ahafene.
ealle þas þing þeode secheð. eower fader wat þæt ge þises be-þurfen.
Ðeah-hwæðere secheð godes rice & ealle þas þing eow beoð ge-icte.
Ne on-dræd þu þeah litle heord. forþan eowren hefenlic fader licode eow rice syllen.
Syllað þæt ge agen & sylleð ælmessen. Werceð seaðes þa þe ne for-ealdiged. un-ge-teorudne goldhord on heofene. þiðer þeof ne ge-neohlaceð. ne mogðe ne ge-wemd.
Ðær eower goldhord is þær beoð eower heorte.
Syen eower lendene be-gyrde & leohtfate bearnende.
& beoð ge-lice þam mannen þe hyore hlaforde abideð hwanne he syo fram gyftan ge-cherred. þæt hyo him sona un-tyne þanne he cymð & cnokeð.
Eadige synde þa þeowes þe se hlaford waciende ge-fint. þanne he kymð. Soðlice ic eow segge þæt he be-gyrt hine. & deð þæt hyo sitteð & gangende heom þenað.
Ænd gyf he kymð on þare æftran wæccen. oððe on þare þridden & þus ge-met. Eadig synde þa þeowes.
